statements: SELECT * FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, email FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation;
SELECT lead_name, interaction_date FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation WHERE action_type='Clicked';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_leads FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation;
SELECT MAX(interaction_duration) AS longest_interaction FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, email FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation WHERE action_type = 'Conversion';
SELECT * FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_name, phone_number FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation WHERE action_type = 'Engagement' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT action_type FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM interaction_duration)) AS avg_duration FROM lead_scoring_and_segmentation;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email, name FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, age, email FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, name, age FROM users WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT action_id, action_name, action_timestamp, action_details FROM user_actions
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM user_actions WHERE action_name LIKE '%login%' AND action_details->>'status' = 'success';
SELECT ua.action_id, ua.action_name, u.name FROM user_actions ua JOIN users u ON ua.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY ua.action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Leads ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM Leads WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT lead_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Leads INNER JOIN Interactions ON Leads.lead_id = Interactions.lead_id;
SELECT segment_name, segment_criteria FROM Segmentation WHERE segment_name LIKE '%VIP%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Leads;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email, lead_score FROM Leads WHERE lead_score > 50;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, lead_id FROM Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, segment_criteria FROM Segmentation WHERE segment_name LIKE '%VIP%';
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email, lead_score FROM Leads WHERE lead_score BETWEEN 50 AND 80 ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email, lead_score FROM Leads WHERE lead_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY lead_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '1234';
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_timestamp FROM events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE user_id = '5678' AND interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, event_id, score_value FROM scores WHERE event_id = 'abcd' ORDER BY score_value DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_type FROM events WHERE event_type='Meeting';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, user_id, event_id FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type='Like' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT user_id, event_id, score_value FROM scores WHERE score_value > 50 ORDER BY score_value DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LeadActions;
SELECT lead_id, action_type FROM LeadActions WHERE action_type = 'Email';
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM LeadInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_score FROM LeadScores WHERE lead_score > 80;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM LeadSegments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%VIP%' ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM LeadActions;
SELECT lead_id, action_type FROM LeadActions WHERE action_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT L.lead_id, L.action_type, S.segment_name FROM LeadActions AS L JOIN LeadSegmentMapping AS M ON L.lead_id = M.lead_id JOIN LeadSegments AS S ON M.segment_id = S.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM LeadScores WHERE lead_score > 80 ORDER BY score_timestamp DESC;

SELECT L.lead_id, S.segment_name, M.mapping_timestamp FROM LeadSegmentMapping AS M JOIN LeadSegments AS S ON M.segment_id = S.segment_id JOIN LeadScores AS SC ON M.lead_id = SC.lead_id JOIN LeadActions AS L ON M.lead_id = L.lead_id WHERE SC.score_timestamp < '2022-06-01';
